<div class='row-fluid'>
<div class='span10 offset1'>
<div class='hero-unit' style='margin-top: -60px'>
<h1 style='text-align: center'>
<img alt="" width="500" height="194" src="http://static.aegisub.org/img/logo-large-bcf2435c.png" />
</h1>
<p>Aegisub is a free, cross-platform open source tool for creating and modifying subtitles. Aegisub makes it quick and easy to time subtitles to audio, and features many powerful tools for styling them, including a built-in real-time video preview.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class='row-fluid'>
<div class='span8 offset2'>
<h2 id='downloads'>Downloads</h2>
<p>The latest stable version is <strong>3.2.2</strong>, released December 7, 2014</p>
<p>See the <a href="changelog/3.2.2/">changelog</a> for a list of changes.</p>
